modName: Horkers and Mammoths Give 2 Tusks (With Optional Additional Giant Toes)
summary: Little mod that makes Horkers and Mammoths drop 2 tusks each. Optional files make giant drop 2, 5, or 10 toes.
descriptionHtml:
Horkers have 2 tusks right (it's 3 actually)? So do mammoths right (4 actually but let's pretend they have only 2 because it'd be too cheap)? Why do they drop only 1 then?Â  I thought it was more realistic that they drop 2. Same thing applies for giants and their toes.
There are 4 files inside the .rar, choose only one:
-Horkers and Mammoths Give 2 Tusks
-Horkers and Mammoths Give 2 Tusks and Giants Give 2 Toes
-Horkers and Mammoths Give 2 Tusks and Giants Give 5 Toes
-Horkers and Mammoths Give 2 Tusks and Giants Give 10 Toes
This took me less than a minute to make so if anyone has a request with different numbers than the ones this mod provides I'd be glad to do it.
Download manually. Choose file and extract it to your skyrim directory\Data.
author: karimkashmar
